verses.roman:
tomā vinā tāṅhāra rakṣaka nāhi dekhi āna
āmāke-ha yāte tumi kailā sāvadhāna

synonyms: tomā vinā—besides you; tāṅhāra—of mother Śacīdevī; rakṣaka—protector; nāhi—not; dekhi—I see; āna—anyone else; āmāke-ha—even unto Me; yāte—by which; tumi—you; kailā—did; sāvadhāna—care.
translation: "I see no one but you to protect her, for you are so careful that you can caution even Me.
